name: Push main profile repo

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # or any other branch you want to trigger on

jobs:
  push_changes:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout source code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      with:
        repository: appsaeed/source-repo
        ref: main  # or the branch you want to pull changes from

    - name: Make changes (if necessary)
      # Add steps here to modify the code, if needed

    - name: Commit and push changes
      run: |
        git config --global user.email "appsaeed7@gmail.com"
        git config --global user.name "appsaeed"
        git add appsaeed
        git commit -m "Automated push from GitHub Actions"
        git push https://github.com/appsaeed/appsaeed.git HEAD:main
